CustomField.description: Protective systems plus extra spaces for print format(This field was created for NPL MA).
CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES(Protective_systems_in_place_for_excavati__c, 'Ladders'), 'Ladders' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Protective_systems_in_place_for_excavati__c, 'Ramps'), 'Ramps' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Protective_systems_in_place_for_excavati__c, 'Shielding/shoring'), 'Shielding/shoring' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Protective_systems_in_place_for_excavati__c, 'Trench box'), 'Trench box' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Protective_systems_in_place_for_excavati__c, 'Covers/plates'), 'Covers/plates' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Protective_systems_in_place_for_excavati__c, 'Barricades/fencing'), 'Barricades/fencing' & BR(), null) + IF( INCLUDES(Protective_systems_in_place_for_excavati__c, 'Other'), 'Other', null)
CustomField.label: Protective systems excavations long
